t: About Import Fees Deposit - Amazon Customer Service
s: Import Fees Deposit is an estimate of the Import Fees for the items in your order. It may not represent the actual amount paid to Customs authorities. If any refunds are due, you'll automatically be refunded the difference to the payment method you used for the order.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

20 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
